thread.title: British fast fashion chain New Look earnings, revenue falls in third quarter

title: British fast fashion chain New Look earnings, revenue falls in third quarter

organizations.name: british fast fashion chain new look

text:
31 AM / Updated 30 minutes ago British fast fashion chain New Look earnings, revenue falls in third quarter Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
LONDON (Reuters) - British fast fashion chain New Look NEWOON.UL on Tuesday said its earnings before interest, tax, depreciation and amortization fell to 43.8 million pounds in the 39 weeks ending in December, from 153.8 million pounds in the same period a year earlier. 
Revenue fell 6.3 percent to 1,069 million pounds. 
The company, which is owned by South Africaâ€™s Brait ( BATJ.J ), has been struggling with declining sales in a fiercely competitive British market. Reporting by Dasha Afanasieva, editing by Maiya Keidan
